description_text:
Bonjour

Je ne comprends pas pourquoi mon achat ne se valide pas à partir de deux
adresse email de connections.
J'ai a chaque fois le message que je ne suis pas autorisé à effectuer cet
achat.

Order #SSN6032

Pouvez vous faire le nécessaire s'il vous plaît.


Cordialement


Dominique Motte

conversations.body_text:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
De : Dominique Motte <dominique.dm.motte@gmail.com>
Date: lun. 12 janv. 2026, 20:19
Subject:
To:
Hi Dominique Motte,  We have received your order for the ProX Ultra pedals to be shipped to France. Your order is being processed in sequence, and we will arrange shipment as soon as possible.

Thank you very much ?

Le mar. 13 janv. 2026, 03:29, service@simsonn.com
Hi Dominique Motte,  You're welcome. Thank you for purchasing our product. Should you have any questions in the future, please feel free to contact us. We will address them promptly.
